html:
5.15.20  8:41 pm   what do you think of oxygen?

      how about this

5.15.20  8:24 pm   Is there a moment in your life where you felt really scared?

      yes

5.15.20  7:53 pm   Does glass exist?

      how did you know

5.15.20  7:53 pm   I fear singing in front of my family as I feel they will make fun of me. What should I do?

      sing in front of someone else's family

5.15.20  6:55 pm   Will humanity ever create the technology to make horses sing?

      already has

5.15.20  6:51 pm   What's the time signature for When I Get Older

     3/4

     and how do I count it.

     at the pace of about 90bpm (can't remember exactly, but that seems close. it's the kick drum in the second verse). just count "1, 2, 3". "When i" is on 3. "Older" should be surrounding 1. "Stronger should be on the next '1'. "Lift" should also be on 1, and also "World" is on 1.

      I think some bars are 6/8 but I'm not sure.

     that adds up, but on paper a switch is not necessary

5.15.20  6:49 pm   how to differentiate a rabbit from a hare

      check what year it is. if it's before 1900, then it might be a hare

5.15.20  6:49 pm   can you legally eat bread

      yes, but only if you are ALONE

5.15.20  6:36 pm   What do you think about 2020?

      it's kinda weird

5.15.20  6:18 pm   what do you want to understand that you just can't seem to?

      how to do wrist twists without the whole rig going haywire

5.15.20  6:13 pm   Would you explain why wave functions collapse in physics?

      because, [google maps voice] "You have arrived."

5.15.20  6:07 pm   Do you like serious or silly questions more?

      don't you get it, seriousness is silly, and sillyness is serious. if that weren't true i'd be long gone by now

5.15.20  5:34 pm   What was in the third box? (Unboxing Video).

      the recipe, for boxes

5.15.20  5:19 pm   Are you a building?

      no, but i can see why you would think that

5.15.20  5:04 pm   how many sides on a circle?

      2. inside and outside

5.15.20  4:48 pm   How is light the fastest if the dark got there first?

      because dark is nothing. nothing is faster than light

5.15.20  4:17 pm   Did Seinfeld use up all the available slap bass?

      Seinfeld gave birth to the second coming of slap bass

5.15.20  4:02 pm   What's your current status?

      Bewildered

5.15.20  3:03 pm   was there a specific influence for your style of graphics in your videos?

      mostly the limitations of the physical universe

5.15.20  2:56 pm   How do i get better at music?

      that's going to happen whether you like it or not

5.15.20  1:50 pm   What do you think about trees?

      they are like a flag the earth waves, as a sign of life

5.15.20  1:34 pm   i don't know if you've read it but robert frost has a poem about picking apples so much that it messes with his head and he poetically hallucinates about apples.
i guess my question is whether something like that has happened to you? i just binge watched firefly without thinking about it and now when i close my eyes it's like i'm still watching it
sort of disorienting lol

      yes, that's normal. if you do something all day, you will see visions of it, especially when you try to go to sleep. every thought you try to have will be shaped into the shape of that activity

5.15.20  1:27 pm   How do you feel about the fact that horses only have about  10 horse power?

      that seems like way too much, i thought each 1 horse was supposed to have 1 horsepower

5.15.20  1:13 pm   I have a tablet why can't I press tab ?

      because tablets have no buttons on them. this is for your own benefit. a lot of people on the news have been hurt by buttons

5.15.20  12:23 pm   what is your viewpoint on living in a society?

      something everyone should experience

5.15.20  12:18 pm   What's your opinion on rabbits? 

      they have a mythological quality to them

5.15.20  12:09 pm   how do you get inspiration for your songs

      i am drowning in inspiration. the hard part is staying afloat

5.15.20  11:53 am   When did you start doing music?

      i don't remember

5.15.20  11:13 am   do you like soup?

      i am impressed by it

5.15.20  10:56 am   whats your favorite texture

      the checker texture, or as i call it, the chexture

5.15.20  10:18 am   How do i stop worryying about useless things

      try going on some staircases, or at least drawing some staircases. Fact about stairways, each stairway is a 'stairway to usefulness'

5.15.20  10:04 am   opinion on science?

      so good it should be illegal

5.15.20  9:23 am   technically pregnant women have eight limbs, so does that make them an arachnid?

      no

5.15.20  9:15 am   If you could forever change one law of physics, what would you change?

      would switch left and right

5.15.20  9:09 am   What should I do for my upcoming 20th birthday so that I would not feel sad about my senescence and the inexorable passage of time? 

      the best strategy for this is to pay no attention to whether or not it's your 'birthday.' Try to not even notice it

5.15.20  8:35 am   Is Finland actually real?

      how did you know

5.15.20  8:25 am   thoughts on the fact that some people think the earth is flat?

      neither are true

5.15.20  8:16 am   Do you have the understand how many people you have made smile? Thank you Bill for always brightening my day even when it's night.

      holy campsite you are very friendly

5.15.20  8:00 am   what's your tips for beginner musicians?

      by the time you get this tip you will no longer be a beginner

      teams of scientists are racing to figure this out, in hopes to one day defeat each other

     music

      are you high?

     i am regular

      it depends on your personality type

      ever tried to draw one

      ever heard of gentleness?.... it's similar

      that depends on the future of the glass

5.15.20  4:39 am   Would you class cereal as soup? 

      only because they share the same parent classification, of sandwich

5.15.20  4:27 am   Is it still 1900?

      no, but it's still after 1900. that's what counts

5.15.20  4:12 am   what song you made do you like most?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

      fake

5.15.20  3:21 am   Eevee's lighting problems amirite?? RELATE NOW RELATE NOW

      of course i relate. my advice is, always remind yourself that not too long ago the only way to make art was to make drawings in mud
